outline:
1. to encounter, befall, meet
    1. (Qal)
      1. to meet, encounter
      2. to befall (fig)
    2. (Niphal) to meet, meet unexpectedly
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to meet
kjv_def: befall, (by) chance, (cause to) come (upon), fall out, happen, meet.
strongs_def: to encounter, whether accidentally or in a hostile manner
